In his [[Jinchūriki Forms#Initial Jinchūriki Form|initial jinchūriki form]], Naruto slashes the opponent and then strikes downward upon them.

== Trivia ==
*This attack shares one portion of its name (Fox Barrage) with another similarly named taijutsu move used by Naruto in his initial jinchūriki form in ''[[Naruto: Ultimate Ninja]]'' (international version only).

[[es:Bombardeo Zorro de las Nueve Colas]]
[[pl:Zapora Dziewięcioogoniastego]]
